website_summaries.verdict: A favorite for curly hair, this leave-in conditioner holds in moisture and can tame the worst of frizz.
cons: If you have fine hair, you may find this to be too heavy

customer_reviews.title: This product dried my hair out so bad. I'm really wondering if the seller I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: This product dried my hair out so bad. I'm really wondering if the seller I purchased this from stuck something else in the bottle. It's pricy, so I wouldn't be surprised at all if that's what happened, since this product generally has great reviews. But I won't be buying any products from Amazon again because that happens to people all the time.
customer_reviews.author: clinton.pettey

customer_reviews.title: Where have I been?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what kept me from trying this product years ago. Honestly, it's expensive, and way more than I've ever spent on a hair product, but I must admit - the price is worth it! My hair responds so well to this leave in: detangling time is literally cut in half, and I love the smell!
customer_reviews.author: Tashawnda Lee Price

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE SALON SIZE
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVEEEE THIS PRODUCT!! I can’t express enough how excited I was when I found this product on Amazon in a LARGE salon size quantity. I am African American and am all natural with the worlds record for breaking combs (lol)! However... No No No ... Qiudad is here to saveee the day!!! Smells AMAZING , provides good curl definition , light texture, and most important it’s a wonderful moisturizer with the flakes. Only compliant was during shipping - the packaging wasn’t all that great so the pump broke, which is the top two reason I purchased this size. Product gets an absolute 5 Stars but due to shipping issue & damaged product I gave 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ang B.

customer_reviews.title: This product lasts me over a year!
customer_reviews.text: Apparently I tend to purchase this once every year and a half because I use it when I do my flat twists and twist outs on freshly washed hair. Also, after I’ve used a leave-in conditioner and a hair butter mixture. I also put a bit of olive oil in the product bc it seems to lack a bit of moisture that my hair needs. I also have 3 different textures 4a/b & a bit of c(back)
customer_reviews.author: MonicaTx

customer_reviews.title: In the shower as a deep condition or as a touch-up. This product is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 6 year old who has very tight curls. Sometimes in the morning her hair gets really frizzy and it use to take us 30 minutes plus half a bottle of dentangler to get a decent look. But with this product all we do is wet her hair - apply the conditioner and we are done! Its perfect every time!!.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product for years. I wasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. I wasn't able to go to my salon, so I thought I'd purchase through Amazon. the pump was already in the bottle, which was odd. Usually that comes on the side to insert myself. The product smells and looks the same but my hair is frizzy when I use it. I am not sure what has happened. Perhaps added water to the product. I will not buy this anywhere but from my salon in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mcpiddy

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff works Great
customer_reviews.text: We got this before when our Son got his Hair done and we had to get a replacement being he was out.. it cost alot of money, but it definitely does work for him.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Brown

customer_reviews.title: This leave in conditioner is the best of them all for my hair
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Ouidad products on my curly hair for a couple of years. This leave in conditioner is the best of them all for my hair, especially now as I age and my hair is changing too. I can shampoo more often and this conditioner just brings my hair back to life.
customer_reviews.author: Liz F

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I love this product. It softens my hair into something lovely and manageable--no easy feat after going platinum blonde. I highly recommend this leave-in conditioner if your hair is in need of some TLC. HOWEVER, the bottle it arrived in was broken, and the spring-loaded top does not pop up. This makes for an inconvenient moment of unscrewing the top and fishing out the product. Eventually, I will transfer bottles to an empty, functional one.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Gjedsted

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best leave in I’ve ever used . Makes my natural hair soft, curly and manageable
customer_reviews.author: Nikitia K. Hardwick

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this leave-in conditioner! It's the ONLY one that works on my fine naturally curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: L. Forest

customer_reviews.title: NO Leakage, Genuine Ouidad Product
customer_reviews.text: no package leakage at all. Bought from the "Beauty Pieces" seller and it arrived in 6 days. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: kelsij

customer_reviews.title: This is an especially good buy in this size
customer_reviews.text: I have curly air on the dry side and this product works well for me. This is an especially good buy in this size, saving you approximately half of what you would pay per ounce in the smaller bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Ouidad for this product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best leave-in-conditioner for my 3C hair. It smells great, moisturizing, and has great slip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This leave in conditioner is worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This product lives up to it's claims. Left my hair soft and manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but the shipping was awful--I won't do it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product but the shipping was awful--I won't do it again. The top was 1) boken; the stuff was 2) spilled; and it was missing 3) the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Calliope

customer_reviews.title: I like this conditioner because it adds a bit of body ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this conditioner because it adds a bit of body and protects my hair from the heat of the hair dryer. Keeps my hair looking healthy. I like it so much that I had to buy this big bottle.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Smells slightly different
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase this product from Ouidad but decided to try Amazon. I don't believe this to be completely authentic. I do believe something was added to the original product. It has a slightly different smell than the product in the bottle I received directly from Ouidad. And I may be mistaken, but I'm almost sure the bottles directly from Ouidad are sealed. My bottle came with a pump already attached to the bottle. I purchased from NYCFashionStore
customer_reviews.author: jmz619

customer_reviews.title: If you have hair that can suck the humidity out of the air and then frizzes ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have hair that can suck the humidity out of the air and then frizzes like that's it's primary purpose you're going to love this conditioner. I have short curly hair that is completely out of control during the summer months (I live on the southeast coast). This conditioner does not weight my hair down but instead gives me bouncy curls with no frizz. Big thumbs up to Ouidad!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Had been using Mixed Chicks, Ouidad seems to really ...
customer_reviews.text: Had been using Mixed Chicks, Ouidad seems to really hold the curl, moisturizer, and my hair feels soft, touchable, and not sticky or flaky.
customer_reviews.author: ZZZ

customer_reviews.title: So I absolutely love the product and have faithfully used it for years
customer_reviews.text: So I absolutely love the product and have faithfully used it for years, the reason I am giving it the rating is not because of actual product. When it arrived the cap did not work it fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Plantlady

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Smells great and helps calm the frizzy curls
customer_reviews.author: mstennac

customer_reviews.title: I've been using them for years and am totally satisfied with their "taming effects
customer_reviews.text: I only use Ouidad products on my curly mop. I've been using them for years and am totally satisfied with their "taming effects."
customer_reviews.author: Cathy H. Hough

customer_reviews.title: Good to know.
customer_reviews.text: I live in the country so I don't have access to this product, which I love for curly hair. And the fact that it's a large bottle it fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Durrett

customer_reviews.title: Pump top doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but the pump top that it came with was broken, making it quite cumbersome to use.
customer_reviews.author: SRA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent leave-in conditioner! Does not weigh hair down and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Morning Reader

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite leave-in conditioner
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite leave-in conditioner. And I've tried so many after eight years of being natural. Perfect for wash days or for including in my spray bottle for refresh days. And it smells great!
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: and it makes it super shiny! There is a notable difference since using ...
customer_reviews.text: My hair has never felt so soft, and it makes it super shiny! There is a notable difference since using this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Devra Romm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It makes my VERY curly hair manageable wven in the high Florida humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Tobi

customer_reviews.title: This weighs down my curls and has a very strong ...
customer_reviews.text: This weighs down my curls and has a very strong chemical smell. When I use it my air purifier immediately turns on. I'm not sure what strong chemicals are in it.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Keyser

customer_reviews.title: I had high expectations about this product and about all ...
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations about this product and about all the Ouidad products. Unfortunately, they did not work for my curls. My curls felt heavy and very dry.
customer_reviews.author: International Girl

customer_reviews.title: It is priced nice compared to the salon and Ouidads site
customer_reviews.text: Combined with Ouidads climate control product, my hair frizz is under control. It is priced nice compared to the salon and Ouidads site.
customer_reviews.author: P.J. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great value,quick delivery! Smells the same and works just like the Ouidad products I've gotten from salons.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this works well when I use the humidity gel to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Alyw00

customer_reviews.title: If you have curly hair and want to maintain nice moist curly locks (without the crunch from gels)
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular. If you have curly hair and want to maintain nice moist curly locks (without the crunch from gels), this is for you! I have been using this product for a while and my curls have never looked better.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my curls for at least 5 days with a little water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... been using this product for several years and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for several years and I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Vero

customer_reviews.title: Perfect supplement to regular deep conditioning treatment.
customer_reviews.text: I use mostly Deva Curl products but Ouidad's Moisture Lock is a must. I use Deva Curl Heaven in Hair conditioner but it still isn't an intense enough moisturizer for my naturally curly hair. Once I rinse out the Heaven in Hair conditioner, I finish it off with this Ouidad product which gives the perfect amount of conditioning.
customer_reviews.author: ccparks

customer_reviews.title: ... have a dog and two cats and they all love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog and two cats and they all love this thing. The fur doesn't exactly peel away from the glove the way it does in the commercial, but I'll deal with that for something that makes grooming my pets so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: OUIDAD Moisture Lock Leave-in Conditioner, 33.8 Fl oz
product_meta.description:
Sometimes your curls need an added boost in the moisture department—particularly if they still look dull or frizzy after you've styled them. The Moisture Lock Leave-In Conditioner from Ouidad helps create a balanced moisture foundation before you begin your style, so curls respond better to the styling products you layer on top. Our breathable leave-in conditioner formula works by sealing nourishment and hydration into each strand, without leaving a greasy residue behind. With moisturizing botanical extracts (Arnica, Prickly Pear) and antioxidants like Green Tea and Vitamin B5 to help protect the hair and promote hair health, you're left with manageable, hydrated, luxuriously silky curls.

Ingredients:

Aqua (Water), Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Amodimethicone, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Leaf Extract, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Polyquaternium-59, Stearyl Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Butylene Glycol, PVP, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Limonene. DN 029-032-01



BRAND STORY
Ouidad is the original curl expert with one iconic idea — let curls be curls. For over 30 years, we’ve perfected a unique customized approach for each curl type: Loose, Classic, Tight, and Kinky curls.
